au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.name: L1=L2=20m_central_apx10
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) sics.drive('nvs_lambda', 5.0) sics.set('/instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength', 5) sics.set('/instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength_spread', 0.1) # Drive detector to short position sics.set('/instrument/detector/detector_y/speed', 53) driveDet(19250,0) # Drive guide to ga config driveGuide(guideConfig.ga) # Drive entrance aperture to 150 (for ga) driveEntRotAp(150) #set sample ap to 10 mm sics.drive('apx', -72) # Drive beamstops up selBs(2) sics.set('beamcenterx', 92.4461) sics.set('beamcenterz', 95.1636)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(39, 100) # Drive attenuator to 240 driveAtt(240)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(39, 0) driveBsz(257)
